.. _apptainer_plugin_disable:

apptainer plugin disable
------------------------

disable an installed Apptainer plugin

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin disable' command allows a user to disable a plugin that is already
  installed in the system and which has been previously enabled.

::

  apptainer plugin disable <name>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer plugin disable example.org/plugin

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for disable

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer plugin <apptainer_plugin>` 	 - Manage Apptainer plugins
